messages.subject: Studies in Kyo Goto
messages.msgSnippet: Hi All A friend of mine has offered to seel me his copy of Studies in Kyo Goto but isn t sure what to ask for it.  I want to make sure he gets a fair price for
messages.messageBody:
Hi All
A friend of mine has offered to seel me his copy of Studies in Kyo
Goto but isn't sure what to ask for it. I want to make sure he gets
a fair price for it. Does anyone know what they got for?
Thanks
Kirk
